/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees line the sidewalk, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day.
